data.eml:eml: Cyrtodactylus wangkulangkulae (Squamata: Gekkonidae), a new Bent-toed Gecko from Satun Province, southern Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sumontha, Montri, Pauwels, Olivier S. G., Suwannakarn, Nikorn, Nutatheera, Thammarat, Sodob, Watchira (2014): Cyrtodactylus wangkulangkulae (Squamata: Gekkonidae), a new Bent-toed Gecko from Satun Province, southern Thailand. Zootaxa 3821 (1): 116-124, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3821.1.8
